name: Pentum
description:
Pentum is a first-person horror stealth game. You will assume the role of a detective investigating the disappearance of multiple children. Find out the forests' many secrets and beware, you are not alone. 

The game was developed by 8 students from MediaDesign Hochschule in Munich, Germany. 

Team:

  • Thora Waldmann: Producer, Head of Design
  • Christian Brückl: Lead Programmer
  • Rebecca Luthe: Lead Artist
  • Felix Gold: Programmer
  • Sebastian Iselt: Programmer
  • Michelle "Myo" Sonntag: Artist
  • Mykhailo Kotendzhy: Artist
  • Porseng Klara Kisa: Artist
